column5: Since I'm not really at liberty to discuss any of the bodies of water I fish, i usually don't post reports. Just thought I'd post some pictures for everyone's perusal.
well it looks like you are having a good year  thanks for sharing
Awesome bunch of fish you have there. Like the bass mostly but those giant cat's look pretty too haha
Hmmmm, pretty secret spots there bdox...   Nice fishies!
Obviously the Grand is no secret spot, either is the Harbor. But the other 3 are
Secret spots or not.... you're having a great year so far Thanks for sharing!!! Leechman
Very nice! Many of places look familiar. What lure is in that bass's mouth?
Wanna get me one a them channel cats!
I'm guess you mean the jig and pig combo, I'm guessing it's a sweet beaver.  Nice fish BTW!!  Very nice year you are having.
Thanks everyone! I hope to continue the trend on Monday when we leave for 5 days of trophy bass fishing.     It's a Texas rigged Sweet Beaver topped off with a Punch Skirt and 3/8oz Tungsten weight.
Looks like a great season so far. I like those pig smallies....2 at a time !
Nice cats! I'd trade the furball terror I have for those anyday! (GF says no tho)
Well thanks for THAT info. I just did a Google image search for "sweet beaver" and forgot to set the filters. Lucky the wife and kids weren't in the room.
nice!
Hey Bdox were you get your punch skirts from I have been looking for them with no luck they look like a great addition to lots of plastics.
Some monster bass, nicely done!
hahaha
Looks like you're having a good summer Bryan but next time change the camera angle, I'd rather not see my employer in the background.
No need to discuss waterbodies here, pics detail location thoroughly enough. Great fish though!
Yes but you failed to mention that it's the "dirty sanchez" one...  NICE, now google "Dirty Sanchez"
Here's some pics from last weeks vacation        And finally, my Buddie's Dad with a monster 6lbr
Awesome fish and an honest 6 pounder. WTG  Clarence
